MSJ student reports on LGBT and women's rights in South Africa

Alexandra Whittaker (MSJ16) has always been interested in issues related to women’s rights, and after researching more about the landscape of women’s rights activism and feminism in South Africa, she knew she wanted to report on something under that umbrella. After numerous talks and Skype sessions with professors and facilitators in South Africa, she was ready to launch.

More News

MM/DD/YYYY

Nancy Utley (BSJ77, MSJ78), president of Fox Searchlight Pictures, will speak to the undergraduate journalism students at the 10 a.m. ceremony.
